details: A dashboard for analyzing social media trends and engagement metrics. Includes real-time data visualization and user-friendly interface.
Platform for delivering courses with video lectures, quizzes, and student progress tracking. Supports multiple instructors and course categories.
Redesign of an existing ecommerce site to improve user experience and increase sales. Features include enhanced product search and streamlined checkout process.
